name: Rhetoric - The Public Speaking Game
description:
Public speaking. The mere thought of it can set hearts pounding! And yet, being able to communicate one’s ideas in public is an important and sought-after skill. With Rhetoric - The Public Speaking Game™, you will become a better speaker.

RHETORIC is an educational game created by Florian Mueck and John Zimmer that will help you improve your public speaking skills and have a great time in the process.

Designed for up to 8 players, RHETORIC will challenge and engage you with a series of public speaking tasks. You and your fellow players will step onto the stage and deliver a series of short speeches, as determined by the squares on which you land.

When you play RHETORIC, you will learn:

• to speak with minimal preparation;
• to control your nerves;
• to structure a speech;
• to speak with conviction;
• to love public speaking.

RHETORIC can be played in English, Spanish, French, Russian, German and Catalan, and will soon be available in other languages. There are three themes: Classic, Business and Family. More will be added.

Now, it’s your turn to speak!

•••••

To bring you the app version of Rhetoric - The Public Speaking Game™, John and Florian worked with Blowing Minds, a terrific indie game studio based in Barcelona, Spain, that designed and developed the app.
